/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. Cars and motorcycles are scattered throughout the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle typical of city life. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding another layer of complexity to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
